flixel.system.input.gamepad.XboxButtonID

type
class
Button IDs for Xbox 360 controllers

Static Variables

A(inline,null) : Int

B(inline,null) : Int

BACK(inline,null) : Int

LB(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_ANALOGUE(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_ANALOGUE_X(inline,null) : Int

LEFT_ANALOGUE_Y(inline,null) : Int

RB(inline,null) : Int

RIGHT_ANALOGUE(inline,null) : Int

RIGHT_ANALOGUE_X(inline,null) : Int

RIGHT_ANALOGUE_Y(inline,null) : Int

START(inline,null) : Int

TRIGGER(inline,null) : Int

Keep in mind that if TRIGGER axis returns value > 0 then LT is being pressed, and if it's < 0 then RT is being pressed

X(inline,null) : Int

Y(inline,null) : Int
